## ISudokuLoggingContext interface

Logging context interface for sudoku library components. Provides optional diagnostic logging capability.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ISudokuLoggingContext 
```

Logging.ILogger


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional diagnostic logger for internal system diagnostics. When provided, enables detailed logging of puzzle operations, hint generation, and solving progress.
